title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 17 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 17 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Hear the right, O LORD, attend unto my cry, give ear unto my prayer, that goeth not out of feigned lips.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你听闻公义，侧耳听我的呼吁。求你留心听我这不出于诡诈嘴唇的祈祷。

lineList.en: Let my sentence come forth from thy presence; let thine eyes behold the things that are equal.
lineList.cn: 愿我的判语从你面前发出。愿你的眼睛观看公正。

lineList.en: Thou hast proved mine heart; thou hast visited me in the night; thou hast tried me, and shalt find nothing; I am purposed that my mouth shall not transgress.
lineList.cn: 你已经试验我的心。你在夜间鉴察我。你熬炼我，却找不着什么。我立志叫我口中没有过失。

lineList.en: Concerning the works of men, by the word of thy lips I have kept me from the paths of the destroyer.
lineList.cn: 论到人的行为，我藉着你嘴唇的言语，自己谨守，不行强暴人的道路。

lineList.en: Hold up my goings in thy paths, that my footsteps slip not.
lineList.cn: 我的脚踏定了你的路径，我的两脚未曾滑跌。

lineList.en: I have called upon thee, for thou wilt hear me, O God: incline thine ear unto me, and hear my speech.
lineList.cn: 神阿，我曾求告你，因为你必应允我。求你向我侧耳，听我的言语。

lineList.en: Shew thy marvellous lovingkindness, O thou that savest by thy right hand them which put their trust in thee from those that rise up against them.
lineList.cn: 求你显出你奇妙的慈爱来。你是那用右手拯救投靠你的，脱离起来攻击他们的人。

lineList.en: Keep me as the apple of the eye, hide me under the shadow of thy wings,
lineList.cn: 求你保护我，如同保护眼中的瞳人。将我隐藏在你翅膀的荫下，

lineList.en: From the wicked that oppress me, from my deadly enemies, who compass me about.
lineList.cn: 使我脱离那欺压我的恶人，就是围困我，要害我命的仇敌。

lineList.en: They are inclosed in their own fat: with their mouth they speak proudly.
lineList.cn: 他们的心被脂油包裹。他们用口说骄傲的话。

lineList.en: They have now compassed us in our steps: they have set their eyes bowing down to the earth;
lineList.cn: 他们围困了我们的脚步。他们瞪着眼，要把我们推倒在地。

lineList.en: Like as a lion that is greedy of his prey, and as it were a young lion lurking in secret places.
lineList.cn: 他像狮子急要抓食，又像少壮狮子蹲伏在暗处。

lineList.en: Arise, O LORD, disappoint him, cast him down: deliver my soul from the wicked, which is thy sword:
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你起来，前去迎敌，将他打倒。用你的刀救护我命脱离恶人。

lineList.en: From men which are thy hand, O LORD, from men of the world, which have their portion in this life, and whose belly thou fillest with thy hid treasure: they are full of children, and leave the rest of their substance to their babes.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你用手救我脱离世人，脱离那只在今生有福分的世人。你把你的财宝充满他们的肚腹。他们因有儿女就心满意足，将其馀的财物留给他们的婴孩。

lineList.en: As for me, I will behold thy face in righteousness: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.
lineList.cn: 至于我，我必在义中见你的面。我醒了的时候，得见你的形像，就心满意足了。
